sentences.sContent: With this generic list node structure, you can now define lists and list operations that work regardless of the type of data stored in them.
sentences.sContent_eng: With this generic list node structure, you can now define lists and list operations that work regardless of the type of data stored in them.
sentences.sCn: 使用这个通用的列表节点结构，您现在可以定义列表和不需要考虑存储在列表中的数据类型的列表操作。

sentences.sContent: If your client code needs this kind of specific functionality, then this generic layer is not enough -- at least as it has been described so far.
sentences.sContent_eng: If your client code needs this kind of specific functionality, then this generic layer is not enough -- at least as it has been described so far.
sentences.sCn: 如果您的客户机代码需要这种特定的功能，那么这个一般层是不够的 ― 至少从迄今对它描述来看是不够的。

synos.tran: 类的；一般的；属的；非商标的

phrases.pCn: n. 泛型算法；通用算法
学名药；通用名药；副厂药
泛型编程；范型程序设计

remMethod.val: gen(种类) + er + ic(形容词后缀) → 种类的， 属的

words.tran: 广义的，普遍的；无显著特点的
推广（generalize的过去分词）；对…进行概括；使…一般化
